text: Roger James Edward Pratt (27 February 1947 â€“ December 2024) was a British cinematographer. He was known for his works in Batman (1989), Frankenstein (1994), 102 Dalmatians (2000), Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets (2002), Troy (2004), Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire (2005), Inkheart (2008) and The Karate Kid (2010). Pratt was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Cinematography for his work in The End of the Affair (1999). Pratt died in December 2024 at the age of 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:2024 deaths Category:British cinematographers Category:People from Leicester
title: Roger Pratt (cinematographer)
